location: Murooj Al Furjan, Al Furjan, Dubai
breadcrumbs: Dubai Villas > Al Furjan > Murooj Al Furjan
description: Poolside Paradise Awaits – Move-In Ready 5-Bedroom Villa for Rent with Unmatched Pool & Park Views!  Step into luxury with this breathtaking 5-bedroom villa, perfectly positioned on a quiet corner plot in Muroojs prestigious gated community. This exceptional home offers unrivaled, unobstructed views of the sparkling pool and lush park, creating a private sanctuary right in the heart of Al Furjan. Thoughtfully designed by Nakheel, this Type A villa combines elegance, spaciousness, and premium finishes for the ultimate in family living.  Key Features: Bright and Spacious Design: This villa radiates an airy elegance with floor-to-ceiling windows, filling the home with natural light. Enjoy an expansive living area, a dedicated dining and entertainment space, and a sophisticated semi-closed kitchen with a large window. The kitchens doors can be closed to create an intimate cooking area, all while remaining central to the homes design.  Opulent Bedrooms: Upstairs, the master suite is a sanctuary of luxury, featuring a walk-in wardrobe, a lavish bathroom with dual sinks, a bathtub, and a separate shower. Each of the three additional upstairs bedrooms boasts built-in wardrobes, private bathrooms, and elegant light wood flooring.  Ground-Floor Ensuite Bedroom: A thoughtfully designed ensuite bedroom on the ground floor provides convenience and privacy, ideal for guests or multi-generational families.  Enhanced Outdoor Living: Step out onto covered balconies with stunning views of the community and skyline, or relax in the villas private, walled garden, perfect for pets and family gatherings. The spacious garden opens to beautiful, unobstructed pool and park views, making it a peaceful retreat.

location: Novelia, Victory Heights, Dubai Sports City, Dubai
breadcrumbs: Dubai Villas > Dubai Sports City > Victory Heights > Novelia
description: Pratima Katiyar with Coldwell Banker is delighted to present you this stunning Golf View Villa in Victory Heights, Novelia. This community is celebrated for its stunning beauty, mature trees, and a serene ambiance that envelops you as you drive along its expansive streets.  This impeccably maintained villa is among the most sought-after five-bedroom designs, boasting a generous plot size of 9,202.07 sq. ft. and an impressive built-up area of approximately 5,600 sq. ft. Nestled in a peaceful cul-de-sac, it is an ideal haven for families with young children.  Upon entering the ground floor, you will be greeted by a spacious open plan living and dining area that overlooks the beautifully manicured garden. A large family room provides the perfect space for entertaining or unwinding after a long day. The fully equipped kitchen features high-quality German appliances, while an en-suite guest bedroom offers versatility as a home office or playroom. Additionally, a maids room with an en-suite bathroom and a separate entrance ensures privacy, conveniently located next to the laundry room. The villa also includes a closed garage for two cars and extra parking space on the driveway.  The exterior is beautifully landscaped, showcasing a lush natural lawn complemented by vibrant flower beds, meticulously maintained to enhance the propertys appeal.  On the first floor, you will find four en-suite bedrooms, each equipped with ample wardrobe space. A landing area provides an excellent opportunity for an office, gym, or TV lounge, catering to your family's diverse needs.  ﻿Just a five-minute stroll away is Novelia Park, an added bonus for families seeking outdoor enjoyment. The villa enjoys convenient access to one of Victory Heights' main gates, as well as major thoroughfares such as Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road.

location: Zumurud Tower, Dubai Marina, Dubai
breadcrumbs: Dubai Apartments > Dubai Marina > Zumurud Tower
description: Rocky Real Estate offers this bright and spacious apartment in Zumurud Tower, Dubai Marina.  * Built-up area: 1,319.44 square feet * Unfurnished * Equipped Kitchen * Built-in wardrobes * With balcony * Pets friendly * 1 car parking Reference number: RO-R-21-2536 Zumurud Tower is located in Dubai Marina. It is a 31-storey luxurious high-rise residential building. Equipped with high-end facilities, this tower is divided into 322 residential apartments. It is a waterfront residential building of Dubai Marina and is located close to Arabian Gulf. Marina Promenade and JBR Beach are at walking distance from Zumurud Tower.  This tower was developed by Bin Hamoodah Development and is an architectural marvel of Khatib & Alami Architects. The building stands 124 m. tall above ground and its construction began in 2006. After completion, the apartments were handed over in 2010.  Zumurud means “Emerald” and the building reflects elegance and style associated with the name. It is a freehold property which makes it perfect for expats to buy or invest in it. Zumurud Tower offers studios, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom units and 4-bedroom penthouses. Residents of this building can easily access Sheikh Zayed Road.
